events.message: The customer reported an auto collision that occurred on the morning of April 30, 2024, involving their vehicle getting rear-ended at a stoplight.
The claim was categorised under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report mentioning the car and collision details clearly.
An agent specialized in auto claims was assigned to handle the case and to assist the customer throughout the process.
The insurance company acknowledged receipt of the claim and assured the customer that the process would be handled promptly and efficiently.
The customer was requested to submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and repair estimates to proceed with claim assessment.
The customer submitted the required photos, police report, and repair quotes promptly as requested for the investigation to begin.
The investigation team initiated a thorough review of the submitted documents and contacted relevant parties to verify all accident details.
The investigation was successfully completed, confirming the liability and extent of damages to the vehicle in the collision.
A settlement offer was proposed to the customer based on the damage assessment and policy coverage for the auto accident.
The customer responded positively to the proposed settlement, expressing satisfaction with the timely handling of the claim.
The claim was approved formally following the customer's acceptance of the settlement offer and verification of all claim conditions.
The payment for the approved claim amount was issued to the customerâ€™s account to cover repair costs of the damaged vehicle.
The auto accident claim was officially closed after confirmation that the customer received payment and repair services were initiated.
All claim documents and records related to the auto accident have been archived according to company policy for future reference.
